constants¶

Data¶

dict ANGLE_UNIT_CONSTANT_NAME_MAPPING

dict COMPONENT_CONSTANT_CLASS_MAPPING

dict COMPONENT_CONSTANT_ITERATOR_CLASS_MAPPING

dict CONSTANT_NAME_MAPPING

dict DATA_CONSTANT_CLASS_MAPPING

dict DATA_CONSTANT_NAME_MAPPING

dict DISTANCE_UNIT_CONSTANT_NAME_MAPPING

dict NUMERIC_DATA_CONSTANT_NAME_MAPPING

dict NUMERIC_DATA_CONSTANT_SIZE_MAPPING

dict SHAPE_CONSTANT_CLASS_MAPPING

dict SHAPE_CONSTANT_COMPONENT_CONSTANTS_MAPPING

dict TIME_UNIT_CONSTANT_NAME_MAPPING

Description¶

Contant data relating to the OpenMaya API.

msTools.core.maya.constants.ANGLE_UNIT_CONSTANT_NAME_MAPPING = {0: 'kInvalid', 1: 'kRadians', 2: 'kDegrees', 3: 'kAngMinutes', 4: 'kAngSeconds', 5: 'kLast'}¶

Constant mapping of OpenMaya.MAngle unit type constants to their respective names.

Type:dict [int, str]
msTools.core.maya.constants.COMPONENT_CONSTANT_CLASS_MAPPING = {532: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnSingleIndexedComponent'>, 538: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnDoubleIndexedComponent'>, 547: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnSingleIndexedComponent'>, 548: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnSingleIndexedComponent'>, 550: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnSingleIndexedComponent'>, 740: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnDoubleIndexedComponent'>}¶

Constant mapping of OpenMaya.MFn component type constants to their respective component function set class. Each function set is a strict subclass of OpenMaya.MFnComponent.

Valid component type constants are OpenMaya.MFn.kMeshVertComponent, OpenMaya.MFn.kMeshEdgeComponent, OpenMaya.MFn.kMeshPolygonComponent, OpenMaya.MFn.kMeshVtxFaceComponent, OpenMaya.MFn.kSurfaceCVComponent, OpenMaya.MFn.kCurveCVComponent.

The function set classes can be used to create or inspect a component encapsulation of the respective component type.

Type:dict [int, type]
msTools.core.maya.constants.COMPONENT_CONSTANT_ITERATOR_CLASS_MAPPING = {538: <type 'OpenMaya.MItSurfaceCV'>, 547: <type 'OpenMaya.MItMeshEdge'>, 548: <type 'OpenMaya.MItMeshPolygon'>, 550: <type 'OpenMaya.MItMeshVertex'>, 740: <type 'OpenMaya.MItMeshFaceVertex'>}¶

Constant mapping of OpenMaya.MFn component type constants to their respective iterator class.

Valid component type constants are OpenMaya.MFn.kMeshVertComponent, OpenMaya.MFn.kMeshEdgeComponent, OpenMaya.MFn.kMeshPolygonComponent, OpenMaya.MFn.kMeshVtxFaceComponent, OpenMaya.MFn.kSurfaceCVComponent.

Note

OpenMaya.MFn.kCurveCVComponent does not have an iterator.

Type:dict [int, type]

Constant mapping of OpenMaya.MFn type constants to their respective names.

Type:dict [int, str]
msTools.core.maya.constants.DATA_CONSTANT_CLASS_MAPPING = {1: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnNumericData'>, 2: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnPluginData'>, 3: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnGeometryData'>, 4: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnStringData'>, 5: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnMatrixData'>, 6: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnStringArrayData'>, 7: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnDoubleArrayData'>, 9: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnIntArrayData'>, 10: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnPointArrayData'>, 11: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnVectorArrayData'>, 13: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnComponentListData'>, 14: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnMeshData'>, 16: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnNurbsCurveData'>, 17: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnNurbsSurfaceData'>}¶

Constant mapping of OpenMaya.MFnData data type constants to their respective function set class. Each function set is a strict subclass of OpenMaya.MFnData.

Valid data type constants are OpenMaya.MFnData.kComponentList, OpenMaya.MFnData.kDoubleArray, OpenMaya.MFnData.kIntArray, OpenMaya.MFnData.kMatrix, OpenMaya.MFnData.kMesh, OpenMaya.MFnData.kNumeric, OpenMaya.MFnData.kNurbsCurve, OpenMaya.MFnData.kNurbsSurface, OpenMaya.MFnData.kPlugin, OpenMaya.MFnData.kPluginGeometry, OpenMaya.MFnData.kPointArray, OpenMaya.MFnData.kString, OpenMaya.MFnData.kStringArray, OpenMaya.MFnData.kVectorArray.

The function set classes can be used to extract data from OpenMaya.MObject wrappers of the corresponding data types. They can also be used to create OpenMaya.MObject data wrappers which can be used as default values when creating typed attributes.

Note

Function sets corresponding to the following data types cannot be used for the creation of typed attributes.

  • OpenMaya.MFnData.kNumeric: Use function sets corresponding to OpenMaya.MFnData.kDoubleArray or OpenMaya.MFnData.kIntArray to encapsulate numeric data.
  • OpenMaya.MFnData.kPluginGeometry: Corresponds to the base function set type for OpenMaya.MFnData.kMesh, OpenMaya.MFnData.kNurbsCurve and OpenMaya.MFnData.kNurbsSurface.
Type:dict [int, type]
msTools.core.maya.constants.DATA_CONSTANT_NAME_MAPPING = {0: 'kInvalid', 1: 'kNumeric', 2: 'kPlugin', 3: 'kPluginGeometry', 4: 'kString', 5: 'kMatrix', 6: 'kStringArray', 7: 'kDoubleArray', 8: 'kFloatArray', 9: 'kIntArray', 10: 'kPointArray', 11: 'kVectorArray', 12: 'kMatrixArray', 13: 'kComponentList', 14: 'kMesh', 15: 'kLattice', 16: 'kNurbsCurve', 17: 'kNurbsSurface', 18: 'kSphere', 19: 'kDynArrayAttrs', 20: 'kDynSweptGeometry', 21: 'kSubdSurface', 22: 'kNObject', 23: 'kNId', 24: 'kAny', 25: 'kLast'}¶

Constant mapping of OpenMaya.MFnData data type constants to their respective names.

Constant mapping of OpenMaya.MFnNumericData numeric type constants to a value representing the size of the numeric type.

Example

NUMERIC_DATA_CONSTANT_SIZE_MAPPING[OpenMaya.MFnNumericData.kFloat] == 1
NUMERIC_DATA_CONSTANT_SIZE_MAPPING[OpenMaya.MFnNumericData.k3Int] == 3

Constant mapping of OpenMaya.MFnNumericData numeric type constants to the class of the corresponding numeric data type. Classes are either bool, float or int.

Type:dict [int, type]
msTools.core.maya.constants.SHAPE_CONSTANT_CLASS_MAPPING = {250: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnCamera'>, 267: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnNurbsCurve'>, 294: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnNurbsSurface'>, 296: <type 'OpenMaya.MFnMesh'>}¶

Constant mapping of OpenMaya.MFn shape type constants to their respective shape function set class. Each function set is a strict subclass of OpenMaya.MFnDagNode.

Valid shape type constants are OpenMaya.MFn.kCamera, OpenMaya.MFn.kMesh, OpenMaya.MFn.kNurbsCurve, OpenMaya.MFn.kNurbsSurface.

Note

Not all shape types have a respective function set.

Type:dict [int, type]
msTools.core.maya.constants.SHAPE_CONSTANT_COMPONENT_CONSTANTS_MAPPING = {267: (532,), 294: (538,), 296: (550, 547, 548, 740)}¶

Constant mapping of OpenMaya.MFn shape type constants to OpenMaya.MFn component type constants.

Valid shape type constants are OpenMaya.MFn.kMesh, OpenMaya.MFn.kNurbsSurface, OpenMaya.MFn.kNurbsCurve.

Each shape type constant maps to one or more component type constants, representing the types of components which can be retrieved from a shape of the given type.

Type:dict [int, (int, …)]
